text: Henning Christophersen (8 November 1939 – 31 December 2016) was a Danish politician. He was the Vice President of the European Commission (1985–1995). He also was the leader of the Danish liberal party Venstre (1978–1984) and member of the European Convention.Henning Christophersen Den Store Danske, Gyldendals åbne encyclopædi ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2016 deaths Category:European Union politicians Category:Danish politicians
title: Henning Christophersen
